title: Adele to Return as 'SNL' Musical Guest with Host Matthew McConaughey!
text:
Adele to Return as 'SNL' Musical Guest with Host Matthew McConaughey! 
Published By: JustJared.com - Today 
Adele is set to return to the Saturday Night Live stage as the musical guest for the November 21 show! The 27-year-old entertainer will be j...
